about_the_game:
StartPlay is the free and ultimate game creator for kids, allowing young minds to bring their imagination to life without writing a single line of code! This free, user-friendly game builder empowers children to design, develop, and share their own games with players around the world.

Key Features:

  • No-Code Game Development: Create engaging games effortlessly using our intuitive graphical interface. Perfect for beginners and young creators!
  • Endless Creativity: Choose from a vast library of characters, objects, 3D models, enemies, and effects to build your dream game.
  • Educational Value: Develop critical thinking, problem-solving, and spatial awareness skills while having fun.
  • Global Community: Share your creations with players worldwide and explore games made by other young developers.
  • Safe and Inclusive: A moderated platform ensuring a positive environment for children to learn and grow.

Collaborative Experience: Work together with friends to create multiplayer games and learn teamwork skills.

Regular Updates: New features and content added regularly to keep the creative juices flowing.

StartPlay is the perfect tool for nurturing the game developers of tomorrow. Whether your child dreams of creating action-packed adventures, brain-teasing puzzles, FPS games, car game, platformer game, or imaginative role-playing games, StartPlay provides the canvas for their creativity.

Download StartPlay today and watch your child's imagination soar in the world of game creation - all for free!

name: StartPlay

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: I3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: I5
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTR 2080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: StartPlay is the free and ultimate game creator for kids, allowing young minds to bring their imagination to life without writing a single line of code! This free, user-friendly game builder empowers children to design, develop, and share their own games with players around the world.
